MainPackage

Class PaybackCalc

  • java.lang.Object
    • MainPackage.PaybackCalc

  • public class PaybackCalc
extends java.lang.Object
    The PaybackCalc object allows for the calculation for monthly school loan repayments with the FinanceLib pmt() method
    Author:
    kreed

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaybackCalc

        public PaybackCalc(double tuition,
                   double increase,
                   double APR,
                   double term)
        Parameters:
        tuition - the tuition the first year the student is in school
        increase - the increase in tuition year to year (%)
        APR - the interest rate while repaying the loan (%)
        term - the repayment term in years
